name: activePool
description: The Active Pool holds the ETH collateral and LUSD debt (but not LUSD tokens) for all active troves

name: borrowerOperations
description: This contract contains all the borrower operations

name: collSurplusPool
description: This contract manages the surplus collateral

name: communityIssuance
description: This contract issues LQTY tokens for the community

name: defaultPool
description: The Default Pool holds the ETH and LUSD debt (but not LUSD tokens) from liquidations that have been redistributed to active troves but not yet applied, i.e. not yet recorded on a recipient active trove's struct

name: hintHelpers
description: This contract contains read-only functionality for calculation of accurate hints to be supplied to borrower operations and redemptions

name: lockupContractFactory
description: The LockupContractFactory deploys LockupContracts - its main purpose is to keep a registry of valid deployed LockupContracts

name: lqtyStaking
description: This contract states the logic for how LQTY staking works

name: priceFeed
description: This contract contains the logic for the price feed. The PriceFeed uses Chainlink as primary oracle, and Tellor as fallback

name: sortedTroves
description: This contract contains a list of all nodes

name: stabilityPool
description: This contract holds LUSD tokens deposited by Stability Pool depositors

name: gasPool
description: The purpose of this contract is to hold LUSD tokens for gas compensation

name: unipool
description: This contract contains the logic for LUSD-ETH LP token staking

name: lusdToken
description: This contract contains the logic for the LUSD stablecoin token

name: lqtyToken
description: This contract contains the logic for the LQTY token. The token captures the fee revenue generated by the Liquity Protocol via staking

name: multiTroveGetter
description: This contract contains read-only functionality for sorted troves

name: uniToken
description: This is the contract for the Uniswap v2 LUSD-ETH pair
